meanings.definition: A muscle of the upper back that connects the scapula to the vertebrae.
meanings.sent1: The rhomboideus helps move the shoulder blade.
meanings.sent2: During exercise, the rhomboideus muscle is engaged.
meanings.sent3: The rhomboideus muscle decided to take a break during the workout.
meanings.sent4: Her rhomboideus muscle was as strong as steel cables.
meanings.sent5: The physical therapist focused on strengthening the rhomboideus for better posture.

meanings.sent1: The rhomboideus figure of the kite made it stand out.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the rhomboideus shape of the gemstone.
meanings.sent3: The rhomboideus pattern on the carpet was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The rhomboideus clouds in the sky resembled giant diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a rhomboideus door that seemed to lead to another world.
